about_the_game:
The world of Vox Machina comes to Wayfinder! The Critical Role Supporter Pack unlocks over 30 cosmetic items, allowing you to bring the world of Exandria into Evenor. Purchase of this pack directly supports Wayfinder and Critical Role in continuing to create incredible experiences for players and fans!

Pack Content:

  • 4 Character Personas

    • Lora as Keyleth

    • Grendel as Grog Strongjaw

    • Niss as Vax’ildan

    • Venomess as Vex’ahlia

  • 1 Trinket Mount & Saddle

  • 4 Character Charms

  • 15 Housing Items

  • 10 Sprays
